headline: Saudi Aramco Slashes Dividend
summary: Since its 2019 IPO, Aramco has significantly underperformed both ExxonMobil and the S&P 500 in stock price, earnings growth, and total returns.

headline: ExxonMobil to Speak at Bernstein 41st Annual Strategic Decisions Conference
summary: SPRING, Texas, May 15, 2025--Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE: XOM) today announced Neil Chapman, Senior Vice President, will conduct a fireside chat at the Bernstein 41st Annual Strategic Decisions Conference in New York on May 29, 2025, at 8 a.m. ET.

headline: BlackRock Energy Opportunities Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: The fund posted returns of 8.63% (Institutional shares) and 8.51% (Investor A shares, without sales charge) for the first quarter of 2025.

headline: Petrobras Stock Looks Cheap, But Is That Enough to Hold On?
summary: PBR recently announced a notable pre-salt oil find at the Aram block, but such long-cycle projects may not ease near-term pressures.

headline: Better Energy Stock: Chevron vs. ExxonMobil
summary: Chevron is an integrated energy giant and so is ExxonMobil.  Both Exxon and Chevron have impressive dividend histories and strong balance sheets.  Chevron has a yield advantage today if you can stand a little near-term uncertainty.

raw.headline: Better Energy Stock: Chevron vs. ExxonMobil
raw.summary: Chevron is an integrated energy giant and so is ExxonMobil.  Both Exxon and Chevron have impressive dividend histories and strong balance sheets.  Chevron has a yield advantage today if you can stand a little near-term uncertainty.

headline: Black Sea CPC Blend oil exports declined to 1.6 million bpd in April, sources say
summary: Black Sea CPC Blend oilexports in April were at 1.6 million barrels per day, or 6.093million metric tons, down from 1.7 million bpd in March, twosources familiar with the data said on Thursday. ...
